Four days later, Dorothy was traced by family members at 1a The Auld Road, G67 2RF, safe and unharmed, after choosing to visit a friend nearby without informing anyone.

narrative=Dorothy Mason, a 13-year-old girl, was reported missing after failing to return from a study group session at the library near her Home on Fulton Road.
